TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed PagerButtons extends System.Enum

Docs.summary: Specifies the types of buttons to display for navigating between pages of content in a paginated control.

remarks.format:
## Remarks The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.PagerButtons> enumeration represents the types of buttons to display for navigating between pages of content in a paginated control. This enumeration is used by the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.PagerSettings.Mode%2A> property to specify the type of navigation buttons to display in controls that use the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.PagerSettings> class, such as <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView> and <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView>.
`PagerButtons.NextPrevious` displays **Next** and **Previous** buttons to access the next and previous pages of the paginated control.
`PagerButtons.NextPreviousFirstLast` displays **Next** and **Previous** buttons as well as **First** and **Last** buttons to directly access the first and last pages of the paginated control.
`PagerButtons.Numeric` displays numeric link buttons corresponding to the pages of the paginated control.
`PagerButtons.NumericFirstLast` displays numeric link buttons corresponding to the pages of the paginated control as well as **First** and **Last** buttons to directly access the first and last pages of the paginated control.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype System.Web.UI.WebControls.PagerButtons NextPrevious = int32(0)

Docs.summary: A set of pagination controls consisting of **Previous** and **Next** buttons.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype System.Web.UI.WebControls.PagerButtons NextPreviousFirstLast = int32(2)

Docs.summary: A set of pagination controls consisting of **Previous**, **Next**, **First**, and **Last** buttons.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype System.Web.UI.WebControls.PagerButtons Numeric = int32(1)

Docs.summary: A set of pagination controls consisting of numbered link buttons to access pages directly.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype System.Web.UI.WebControls.PagerButtons NumericFirstLast = int32(3)

Docs.summary: A set of pagination controls consisting of numbered and **First** and **Last** link buttons.
